About the Company: India Nippon Electricals Ltd is engaged in the manufacture of Electronic Ignition Systems for two-wheelers, three wheelers and portable engines. Over the years the company has enlarged their customer base and now supplies to most of the manufacturers of two-wheelers, three wheelers and gensets. The product range of the company includes FlyWheel Magneto/Generator, Capacitor Discharge Ignition Unit , Ignition Coil ,Integral Unit & Regulator/Rectifier Units.
